Text:
Found that on Macupdate.com

"Requirements

    PPC / Intel
    OS X 10.7.4 or later"

Are you shure that Numbers 2.2 supports Mac OSX 10.6.8? I'm not shure

I tested it even yet. This version does NOT START on 10.6.6 and/or 10.6.8.

This version of Numbers requires Mac OS X 10.7.4 or higher

uploader wrote: Requirements: Mac OS X 10.6.6 or later

This is definitely a false statement. Waste your time
